title: 92/101/EEC: Commission Decision of 28 January 1992 determining the period of the year during which Spain may dispatch certain equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 28 January 1992  determining the period of the year during which Spain may dispatch certain equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness  (92/101/EEC)
THE COMMISSION  OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Spain may dispatch equidae from the part of its territory considered to be infected with African horse sickness from 1 February to 30 April.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 January 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 42.
